item.title: My business travel essential goes everywhere with me - and it probably isn't what you'd expect
item.description: The Skysper foldable backpack may not be the peak of human ingenuity, but I've found it to be an absolute essential for business travelers.

item.title: Asus vies for fastest mini PC ever with Panther Lake NUC 16 Pro — B390 GPU inside the Core Ultra X9 388H impresses but won't beat the 8060S
item.description: The Panther Lake based Asus NUC 16 Pro blends strong integrated graphics with leading AI performance.

item.title: What’s on your desk, Stevie Bonifield?
item.description: Stevie Bonifield is a news writer here at The Verge and, they say, “I cover a little bit of just about everything, from the FCC to AI shopping tools to Linux.” Before joining our news team, they wrote weekend news for PC Gamer and did reviews, news, features, and guides for Laptop Mag, along with […]

item.title: The Playdate gets its Monument Valley
item.description: Diora might be the most ambitious game I've played on the Playdate. It's all about perspective: You turn the handheld's crank to rotate your viewpoint of the bite-size 3D landscapes, which lets you peek around corners to find solutions to various puzzles. On a device with a 1-bit, black-and-white display, the miniature worlds feel miraculous, […]

item.title: NFL Wildcard Round 2026 Free Streams: How to Watch Rams vs Panthers, Packers vs Bears From Anywhere in the World
item.description: Saturday sees the first of six Wildcard games this postseason and here's how you can watch NFL Wildcard Round 2026 games for free and from anywhere in the world.

item.title: From rollable screens to a new AI tabletop companion - 5 of the best new Lenovo releases we saw at CES to boost your office...and one coming soon
item.description: Rollable screens, sensor hubs, and the most powerful ThinkPads ever - we go hands-on with Lenovo's top CES 2026 products.

item.title: How to change location with a VPN
item.description: Chances are that you're here because you've heard a virtual private network (VPN) can change your virtual location, and want to know what that means. If you know already, head over to my best VPN list to learn which services I recommend for changing your location. But if you're clueless, read on.Whenever any device connects to the internet — whether it's a laptop, a phone or a smart Lego brick — it's assigned a unique IP address that other devices can use to identify it. Think of the name you give the barista at a coffee shop, except instead of a hot beverage, you’re being served websites and ...

item.title: Je suis monté à bord de la Zeekr 7GT : pourquoi cette voiture électrique qui recharge en 13 minutes m’a mis une claque
item.description: Après des mois d'attente, la Zeekr 7GT arrive enfin en Europe. Cette voiture électrique promet un style spectaculaire, des technologies dernier cri, une recharge ultra-rapide... et elle sera bientôt vendue en France. Voici mes premières impressions.

item.title: The World’s Oceans Soaked Up Record-Breaking Heat for the 9th Straight Year
item.description: The global ocean heat content increased yet again in 2025, further raising the risk of catastrophic storms, seal level rise, and coral bleaching.

item.title: The CES 2026 stuff I might actually buy

This week, I've been reading about gerrymandering and watch conventions and John […]

item.title: A charity speedrunning event has turned into a perfect showcase for smaller games
item.description: Games Done Quick, the biannual charity speedrunning event currently going on right now, not only helps organizations like the Prevent Cancer Foundation and Doctors Without Borders - it helps indie games get noticed, too. Indie game developers face an incredible uphill battle not only getting their projects funded, completed, and launched, but discovered as well. […]...

item.title: Branded entertainment will just be entertainment in 2026
item.description: What marketers need to know to win in the new battle for attention, as Instagram heads to TV and Hollywood wants their money. We’ve had branded entertainment since Procter & Gamble invented soap operas back in the 1930s. But today, brands are forced to diversify the ways in which they gain and hold our attention. It’s no longer as viable or effective to depend on traditional paid media tools. ...

item.title: Cette mini borne d’arcade avec 45 jeux perd plus de 40 % de son prix chez Amazon pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Entre un design qui tient dans la main et 45 jeux disponibles, cette mini borne d'arcade de la marque Unico pourra vous assurer de longues heures de jeu. Amazon profite des soldes d'hiver pour retirer 41 % de son prix et la faire passer à 59,49 euros.

item.title: Best Deals for New Year’s Resolutions: Sleep, Fitness, and More (2026)
item.description: Whether you’re hitting the gym or tracking your schedule, these discounts on WIRED-approved gear can help.
